Multiple national news outlets reported: C. Moore was going out of business and closing all its stores, including The New York Post, CBS News, and CNN.
A press release from A: C. Moore's parent company, Nicole Crafts, confirmed the decision to exit its retail operations and close the A.C. Moore stores as part of a broader strategic plan.
The CEO of A: C. Moore, Anthony Piperno, acknowledged the challenges faced by the chain in today's retail environment, making it difficult to operate and compete on a national level.
Michaels: the leading arts-and-crafts retailer, announced that it would be taking on the leases of around 40 A.C. Moore locations, indicating the validity of the claim that the stores would be closing.
